info.title: SmithTech API with Insights
info.description: API endpoints for SmithTech with insights and operation IDs.

get.description: This endpoint is a reference table containing the SystemName and SytemID for the hospital systems. It should be use whenever a SystenName or SystemID is needed  or given by the user. There ar eother routes that require a SystemID and should use this as a  reference table
get.insight: Endpoint '/api/systems' is designed as a reference table containing the system names and ID for the hospital systems.

get.description: This endpoint is a reference table containing the location names and ID for the hospital systems. It should be use whenever a LocationID is needed to be passed into another route
get.insight: Endpoint '/api/locations' is designed as a reference table containing the LocationName and LocationID for all locations, also contains SystemID, address, URL information.

get.description: This endpoint is a reference table containing the location names and ID for the hospital systems. It should be use whenever a LocationID is needed to be passed into another route
get.insight: Endpoint '/api/locations/<int: SystemID>' is designed as a reference table containing the Location information and ID for the given hospital system using SystemID.

get.description: This endpoint is a reference table containing the insurance plan names and ID for the hospital systems. It should be use whenever a PlanID needed to be passed into another route
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/insurances' is designed for This endpoint is a reference table containing the PlanName PanID for all the Insurance Plans.

get.description: Get the list of SystemIDs and LocationIDs for the given InsurancePlanID
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/insurances/<int: PlanID>' is designed for Example used to get InsurancePlan information for the given PlanID.

get.description: This endpoint is a reference table containing the insurance type names and ID for the hospital systems. It should be use whenever a InsuranceTypeID needed to be passed into another route
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/insurance-types' is  reference table containing the InsurancyTypeID, InsuranceTypeName for all of the different insurance types.

get.description: Example used to get InsuranceTypeID, InsuranceType for  given InsuranceTypeID
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/insurance-types/<int: InsuranceTypeID>' is designed for Example used to get InsuranceType information for given InsuranceTypeID .

get.description: Example used to get plans for given CarrierID
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/insurance-plans/<int: CarrierID>' is designed to get plans for given CarrierID.

get.description: Get In-network insurance plans for a SystemID
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/records/system/<int: SystemID>' is designed  to get in network insurance plans for a given SystemID.

get.description: Get charges for a given SystemID and LocationID
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/records/system/<SystemID>/location/<LocationID>' is designed to get in network insurnace plans for a given SystemID and LocationID.

get.description: Example Use get the LocationID and SystemID for given PlanID
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/network-info/<int PlanID>' is designed  to get all in network SystemID and LocationID for given PlanID.

get.description: Returns all the table in the database
get.insight: Endpoint '/db_admin/tables' is designed for Returns all the table in the database.

get.description: Example returns list of rows where billing code
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/charges/billingcode/99212' is designed for Example returns list of rows where ServiceDescription is = 99212.

get.description: Example returns list of rows where descroptin is like
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/charges/description/<string: Description>' is designed for Example returns list of rows where BillingCode is like '%lung%'.
